# rosuvastatin
---
title: Rosuvastatin
description: 
created: 09/01/2021
modified: 09/01/2021
tags: [drugs, statins]
status: notes
url: rosuvastatin
---


* The pharmacokinetics of rosuvastatin is altered in patients of Asian origin, which may increase their risk of myopathy.
